statements: SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, schedule_date FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, schedule_date, deadline_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE deadline_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT course_name, schedule_date FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, announcements FROM CourseSchedule WHERE announcements IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT DISTINCT course_name FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, announcement FROM CourseSchedule WHERE deadline_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_date > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, deadline_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE announcements IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_id, course_name, start_date, end_date FROM course_schedules;
SELECT * FROM course_schedules WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM course_schedules WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, end_date, course_id FROM course_schedules ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, start_date, end_date FROM course_schedules WHERE start_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedules WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM course_schedules WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, count(*) AS total_deadlines FROM deadlines GROUP BY course_id HAVING total_deadlines > 5;

SELECT course_id, course_name, deadline_date, description FROM course_schedules JOIN deadlines ON course_schedules.course_id = deadlines.course_id WHERE deadline_date < '2023-06-30' ORDER BY deadline_date;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM course_schedules WHERE course_name LIKE '%Database%' AND course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM deadlines WHERE deadline_date = '2023-01-15');
SELECT course_name, schedule_date, start_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT course_name, end_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 1
SELECT task_name, deadline_date FROM Deadlines WHERE deadline_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT announcement_title, announcement_description FROM Announcements WHERE announcement_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT course_name, schedule_date, start_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Deadlines WHERE deadline_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT announcement_title, announcement_description FROM Announcements WHERE announcement_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-07-31';
SELECT course_name, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_date < '2022-08-15' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Deadlines WHERE task_name LIKE '%assignment%' ORDER BY deadline_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, announcement_text FROM courses INNER JOIN announcements ON courses.course_id = announcements.course_id;
SELECT course_name, schedule_date FROM courses INNER JOIN schedules ON courses.course_id = schedules.course_id WHERE schedule_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_date, course_name FROM schedules JOIN courses ON schedules.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, deadline_date, description FROM courses JOIN deadlines ON courses.course_id = deadlines.course_id ORDER BY deadline_date ASC;

SELECT announcements.announcement_id, announcements.announcement_text, courses.course_name FROM announcements LEFT JOIN courses ON announcements.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE announcement_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id;
SELECT announcement_date, message FROM Announcements WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY announcement_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_status FROM Students WHERE enrollment_status = 'Enrolled';
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, schedule_date FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT s.student_name, c.course_name, e.enrollment_date FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN CourseSchedule c ON e.course_id = c.course_id ORDER BY e.enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT d.description, c.course_name, a.message FROM Deadlines d JOIN CourseSchedule c ON d.course_id = c.course_id JOIN Announcements a ON d.course_id = a.course_id;
